query.statement: UPDATE MAP_MAKEUP_ACCT SET ATTR01=#ATTR01# , ATTR02=#ATTR02# , ATTR03=#ATTR03# , ATTR04=#ATTR04# , ATTR05=#ATTR05# , ATTR06=#ATTR06# , ATTR07=#ATTR07# , ATTR08=#ATTR08# , ATTR09=#ATTR09# , ATTR10=#ATTR10# , UUSER=#UUSER# , UDATE=SYSDATE WHERE YY=#YY# AND ACCT_CD=#ACCT_CD# AND STD_CD=#STD_CD#
